definitions: SHOW RED, LOOK RED. Example: THE CAR LOOKS RED UNDER THE TREE/Otjihauto matji sera-vere kehi yomuti.
I AM IN NEED OF FOOD/Mba hepa ovikurya. FOR/hepera(e).
Example: THE PERSON RETURNED (HERE) TO WINDHOEK/Omundu wa kotoka kotjomuise yaruka.
(e). Example: THE BOY RIDES A BI-CYCLE/Omuzandu ma kavire oka-nyeti.
Example: THE MAN TRAVELLED PAST THE KRAAL WITHOUT STOPPING/Omundu wa ka-pita onduurungu nokuhinokukonda ponganda.
THE FRUIT IS RIPE/Ovi-hape vya papa. Also: hora(o).
THE SWEAT ROLLS DOWN/Orukutu maru randata
THE STONE ROLLS DOWN THE MOUNTAIN/Ewe mari kurunguta kondundu
THE MEAT IS ROTTEN/Onyama ya motika
